messages.content: Convocation mein sab medals aur awards le rahe honge. Main bas ek ordinary degree leke jaunga. Parents ke friends puchenge toh kya bolenge.
Wo ceremony mein invisibility aur unke friends ka judgment - dono heavy. Ordinary degree se problem hai ya feel karna ki proud nahi kar paoge unhe?
I thought getting a degree would open doors but now I see that it's just the bare minimum. Everyone has a degree. I'm not special, I'm not smart, I'm just... mediocre.
Degree went from achievement to bare minimum - that shift stings. Mediocre feel hone se problem hai ya dar hai ki mediocre means opportunity nahi milega?
Graduation ke baad ghar wale shaadi ki baat karenge agar job nahi mili. Feel like my worth is just tied to either getting employed or getting married.
Dono options mein apni choice nahi hai, sirf expectations - that's suffocating. Worth tied to these things feel hone se zyada dar hai ya in dono se escape nahi hone ka?
Padhai khatam hone wali hai par mujhe lagta hai main kisi bhi kaam ke layak nahi hoon. Interview mein jane se pehle hi dar lagta hai ki pakde jaaunga.
Sabko pata chalne ka dar - jaise dhokha pakda jayega. Layak na hone ka matlab skills ki kami ya khud par vishwas ki?
My college topper got into Google, second ranker in Amazon. I'm here struggling to even get interview calls. Feel like I don't belong in the same batch as them.
Their success is highlighting your struggle - making you feel like you don't belong. Not belonging ka matlab unke level tak nahi pohoch sakte ya deserve hi nahi karte same opportunities?
Final year mein hoon aur soचता hoon ki 4 saal mein jo seekha wo real job mein kaam ayega bhi ya nahi. Lagta hai practical world ke liye prepared hi nahi hoon.
College learning aur practical world mein gap dekh ke prepared nahi lagta - wo uncertainty real hai. Prepared na hone se matlab seekha kam hai ya apply karna nahi aata?
Sab batchmates LinkedIn pe apni achievements post karte rehte. Mere paas post karne ko kuch hai hi nahi. Sharam aati hai profile khol ne mein.
Unki highlight reel aur tumhara blank canvas - wo comparison sharam la raha. Achievements na hone se zyada painful kya hai, kuch post na kar pana ya invisible feel hona?
Degree lene ke baad kya karunga yeh sochke ghabrati hoon. Maa baap ne itna paisa kharch kiya, ab agar safal nahi hui toh unka sapna toot jayega.
Unka sapna tumhare kandhe par hai aur tootne ka dar bhaar badha raha. Safal na hone ka matlab kya - unki umeed todna ya khud ko nakaam samajhna?
I'm about to finish my degree but I can't shake this feeling that I'm going to end up doing something I hate for the rest of my life just to pay bills.
That vision of lifelong dissatisfaction for survival - heavy already. End up doing something you hate ka darr zyada hai ya option hi nahi hone ka?
College ke last semester mein hoon aur mujhe already regret ho raha hai ki maine opportunities waste kar di. Ab change karne ka time nahi bacha.
Past opportunities gone aur ab too late feel ho raha - wo finality painful hai. Regret zyada hai ya belief hai ki ab kuch change hi nahi ho sakta?
Graduating in a few months and I keep thinking what's the point? I'll just be another corporate slave doing meaningless work. Is this all there is?
That existential emptiness before career even starts - questioning the whole path. Meaningless work ka darr hai ya feel karna ki better option exist hi nahi karta?
Padhai poori hone wali hai lekin mujhe lagta hai jo bhi naukri karunga usme khush nahi rahungi. Sab log paiso ke peeche bhaag rahe, main kya chahti hoon woh samajh nahi aa raha.
Sab ki race clear hai aur tumhe apni chaahat ka pata nahi - wo disconnection isolating hai. Khush nahi rahungi ka darr hai ya yeh feel karna ki kya chahiye woh pata hi nahi?
Mere younger sibling ko already company ne pre-placement offer de diya. Main unse do saal bada hoon aur abhi bhi jobless. Ghar mein sab compare kar rahe hain.
Chote ne overtake kar liya aur ghar mein comparison chal raha - that humiliation cuts deep. Compare hone se zyada painful kya, unka aage hona ya tumhara peeche?
Snatak hone ke baad kya hoga yeh sochke neend udh jaati hai. Agar achhi naukri nahi mili toh log kahenge padhai ka koi fayda nahi hua.
Log kya kahenge woh neend cheen raha - unka judgment bhaar ban gaya. Achhi naukri na milne se zyada dar kya, logon ki baaton ka ya khud ko bekar samajhna?
I'm finishing my degree with no clear plan. My parents keep asking what's next and I lie to them saying I'm figuring it out. Truth is, I'm terrified and completely lost.
Lying to them because the truth feels too shameful - that isolation is heavy. Terrified aur lost hone ka matlab direction nahi hai ya dar hai ki direction mil bhi nahi sakti?
Final year project defence hai next week. Pass ho jaunga par after that complete blank. Job nahi, plans nahi, kuch nahi. Degree leke ghar baith jaunga.
Defence cross karne ke baad total void - woh blank zyada scary lag raha degree se. Ghar baith jaane ka darr unemployment ka hai ya stagnant hone ka?
Graduation ceremony invite aayi hai. Parents excited hain but I feel nothing. Just dread. Like I'm celebrating the end but there's no beginning in sight.
Unka excitement aur tumhara dread - wo gap isolating hai. No beginning in sight ka matlab options nahi dikh rahe ya start karne ki himmat nahi?
Mere college mein ek ladka hai jo already 2 startups fail kar chuka but phir bhi try kar raha. Main toh ek baar bhi try nahi kar paa raha kuch. Dar lagta hai.
Uski failures ke baad bhi courage dekh ke tumhari inaction zyada lag rahi - comparison heavy hai. Dar kis baat ka, fail hone ka ya try karne ki capability na hone ka?
Meri degree khatam hone wali hai lekin mujhe lagta hai main duniya mein koi yogdaan nahi de paungi. Bas ek aur vyakti jo sirf jee raha hai, kuch khaas nahi.
Yogdaan na de paane ka ehsaas - jaise existence bekaar hai. Khaas na hone se matlab bada impact nahi bana paogi ya khud ko bekar samajh rahi ho?
College khatam hone ke baad ghar mein roz explanation dena padega ki aaj kya kiya, kahan apply kiya. Can't handle that daily interrogation.
Daily accountability without results - wo pressure already suffocating lag raha. Interrogation handle nahi kar paoge ya results na hone ki sharam?
I see my seniors struggling in jobs they hate, burned out at 25. Is that my future too? Just survival mode forever?
Their burnout is previewing your future - making it feel predetermined. Forever survival mode ka darr hai ya feel karna ki escape ka option hi nahi?
Mujhe masters karna hai but financially possible nahi hai. Job karni padegi jo pasand nahi. Dreams vs reality - reality jeet gayi already.
Financial constraints ne dreams crush kar diye aur defeat feel ho raha already. Reality jeet gayi ka matlab compromise karna padega ya hope hi khatam ho gayi?
